about_the_game:
Pucelle, a clumsy 16-year-old wand-making student at Grimora Magic School, finds herself tasked with managing an old magic wand shop called Wonder Wandelier as part of her final test to graduate from school. Not only does she need to ensure her grades are passable, but she also needs to learn how to become a successful entrepreneur—a task even harder than creating a magic wand!

You'll found out that as a wand maker, crafting magic wands is just the beginning - you'll also need to gather all the materials you need and sell your creations to the world. Will you go all-in with full capitalism to maximize your profits, or will you take a more patient approach and slowly build up your reputation with customers?

Crafting magic wands requires resources, and to obtain resources, you must manage your time and money effectively. Decide which magic wands to create each day and which type of customer you want to attract. Keep a keen eye on the news and trends that happened around your shop to maximize profits.

Being an entrepreneur means squeezing every penny from your customers, but it's an art you must master. Study their moods, set the right atmosphere, and work hard to gain their trust. Do it right, and they'll willingly empty their pockets for you.

Bring a partner and venture into the wild world beyond The Portal. Forage for materials, seek hidden treasures, and unravel the mysteries that lie ahead.

Always stay on your toes! This alien world gradually drains your energy, and if you faint here, your partner must carry you back with a limited carrying capacity, forcing you to leave behind collected items and materials.

The world beyond the portal teems with wildlife. Some creatures are docile, others skittish, while some will attack you on sight. Engage in combat and defeat them or offer their favorite food to see how they repay your kindness.

Not all magic wands are created equal. Some require rarer materials and intricate craftsmanship, but they fetch a much higher price. Discover recipes and hone your wand-making skills to consistently produce the highest quality magic wands on the market.

Build trust with your customers by fulfilling their requests and attentively listening to their stories. Take time to hang out with your friends, as they bring out the best in you while you establish a thriving wand-making business.

short_description: You're an apprentice wand maker trying to graduate from school - but you only have 30 days to work on it! Manage your store, gather materials, and craft magic wands to sell to customers. Haggle to get the best price and build reputation as a wand maker in this chill magic wand-shop simulation RPG.
